location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.4743 of 1851 from Arthur Malet, Chief Secretary to the Government of Bombay, to Lt-Col Samuel Hennell, Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: Letter from Malet in reply to Hennell's letter regarding the state of his health and desire to quit Bushire (folio 13). Malet responds that, if other arrangements for taking over the Residency cannot be made before Hennell leaves his post, the Residency should be left in charge of Commodore Porter of the Indian Navy.
